front.title: IEEE Standard for WirelessMAN-Advanced Air Interface for Broadband Wireless Access Systems Amendment 1: Enhancements to Support Machine-to-Machine Applications

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Enhancements to the WirelessMAN-Advanced Air Interface, an air interface designated as “IMT-Advanced” by the International Telecommunication Union-Radiocommunication Sector (ITU-R), are specified in this standard. Improved support for machine-to-machine applications are provided by these enhancements.
